bs-socialtopics-pref-skipcreatedialog: Label for the the skip dialog checkbox on discussion creation in user preferences.
bs-socialtopics-toc-entalkpageautocreate: Label for the checkbox on [[Special:BlueSpiceConfigManager]] that activates the automatically creation of all discussion pages
bs-socialtopics-autocreated-discussionpa: Content of a discussion page that was created automatically
Content of a discussion page of a file that was created automatically
bs-socialdiscussion-discussiontype: Label for option "discussion" in entry field "type"{{Identical|Discussion}}
bs-socialdiscussion-topictype: Label for option "topic" in entry field "type"{{Identical|Discussion topic}}
bs-socialtopics-entitydiscussion-header:
{{notranslate}}
Headline for a "discussion" entry. Must link to discussion page [[$9|$9]]
* $1 - Username of the owner of this entry
* $2 - Real name of the owner of this entry
* $3 - Main part of title of the source page, this entry is saved in as json data
* $4 - Namespace number of the page, this entry is saved in as json data
* $5 - Namespace name of the page, this entry is saved in as json data
* $6 - Main title part of the discussion page, this entry refferes to
* $7 - Namespace number of the discussion page, this entry refferes to
* $8 - Namespace text of the discussion page, this entry refferes to
* $9 - Full title of the discussion page, this entry refferes to
bs-socialtopics-entitydiscussion-header-: Header for a discussion entry, that is not yet existing{{Identical|Create new discussion}}
bs-social-entitytopic-header-create: Header for a topic entry, that is not yet existing{{Identical|New Topic}}
bs-social-entitytopic-header:
{{notranslate}}
Headline for a "topic" entry. Must link to special page [[Special:Topics/$3|Special:Topics/$3]]
* $1 - Username of the owner of this entry
* $2 - Real name of the owner of this entry
* $3 - Main part of title of the source page, this entry is saved in as json data
* $4 - Namespace number of the page, this entry is saved in as json data
* $5 - Namespace name of the page, this entry is saved in as json data
bs-socialtopics-var-discussiontitleid:
Label for entry field "discussiontitleid".
{{Identical|Assigned discussion page}}
bs-socialtopics-entity-fatalstatus-save-: Error text that is showen, when an entry is not assigned to a valid discussion page
bs-socialtopics-entity-topic-topictitle-:
Default text for the "topictitle" field when migrated from Shoutbox extension that states who created it.
* $1 - Name of the user, who created it
topics:
Special page name for [[Special:Topics]] special page.
{{Identical|Topics}}
bs-socialtopics-special-topics-heading: Special page header for [[Special:Topics]] special page.
bs-socialtopics-aftercontent-heading:
Label of the discussions section of a pages content
{{Identical|Discussions}}
bs-socialtopics-nodiscussionpage: Text that shows when no discussion page has been created yet.
bs-socialtopics-nodiscussionpage-create: Label for the buttons, that lets the user create a new discussion page
bs-socialtopics-nodiscussion: Text that shows when no discussion entry has been created yet.
bs-socialtopics-notopicsadded: Text that shows when no topic has been created yet.
bs-socialtopics-dialog-creatediscussionp:
Short label for the save button in the dialog, that creates a new discussion page
{{Identical|Save}}

Short label for the cancel button in the dialog, that creates a new discussion page
{{Identical|Cancel}}

Label for page content textarea in the dialog, that creates a new discussion page
{{Identical|Content}}
bs-socialtopics-switch-nodiscussion-desc: Description for behavior switch "<nowiki>__NODISCUSSION__</nowiki>" that hides the discussion after the page.
